channel.title: Join Object on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Join Object on Blog

item.title: Join-Object
item.description: If you ever wrote SQL queries and now use PowerShell for scripting maybe you missed ‘Join’ possibility in PoSH. Here it is! Nothing special. I just tried to create Join-Object with the same functionality as inner/outer Join statements in SQL. My version of Join-Object uses standalone Merge-Object function for merging 2 arrays of custom objects / hashtables. Resulting object is an array of objects that contains all properties from joined objects except the ones with the same name, which are discarded.
